page.title: 12HOME LIFE
page.content: THIS IS WEDNESDAY,JULY 17TH 1985. I AWAKE AT 6AM,READ TILL 7.30 THEN ARISE.I PUT MY MILK BOTTLE AND 23 PENCE ON THE DOORSTEP.THE MILK IS DELIVERED FROM GREAT AYTON THREE TIMES EACH WEEK.THE NEXT CALLER WILL BE THE POSTMAN.IHAVE HAD A HEAVY POST THIS WEK BECAUSE I CELEBRATED MY 85TH BIRTHDAY ON MONDAY.I GO TO DRAW MY NATIONAL RETIREMENT PENSION FROM THE POST OFFICE THEN I WILL BUY FROM THE BREADMAN WHO COMES FROM SCARBOROUGH TWICE A WEEK.ON THIS WEDNESDAY I WILL CHANGE MY LIBRARY BOOKS IN THE LIBRARY VAN WHICH COMES ALTERNATE WEEKS. HOUSEWORK,GARDENING,LETTER WRITING AND WATCHING SPORT AND SCRABBLE PROGRAMMES ON T.V.WILL FILL MY DAY.I AM A MEMBER OF VARIOUS SOCIETIES AND MAY ATTEND A MEEETING IN THE EVENING.I WILL BE IN BED AROUND 11P.M.FOR A READ THEN SLEEP. LAURA.B.RAMSAY.
